Ta bort\nLägg till en ändring för att starta den här funktionen

Den valda aktiviteten kan inte läggas till två gånger
när du markerar ikonen kommer fler inställnings alternativ visas

To add a %1$s, select the Add icon. Once a %1$s is added, selecting the row will change the target%2$s

To remove a %1$s, swipe the row horizontally left or right. Re-order a %1$s in the list by vertically dragging the anchor on the left.

To clear or reset to defaults, select the Reset icon.
Removing every %1$s in the list will disable the feature entirely.
Removing every %1$s in the list will disable the second pie layer entirely.

Allows swiping on the navigation bar to enable one handed mode
Back and Home are required to be set at all times. To change a Back or Home assignment, set the desired assignment first
When only a right or left action is assigned, the action applies to the full bar
Fine tune long swipe thresholds based on a percentage of Fling interface width or height

Display left and right cursor buttons while typing. Overrides IME switcher.

When in editor mode, medium press and drag a button to change its position or long press a button to show the edit menu. Button position may be changed while menu is showing.\n\nSetting a double tap action will delay single tap a bit.
Set the position of contextual buttons such as menu and ime selector
Set the animation style of the primary buttons when they are pressed

Set what buttons to show when a on-screen keyboard is showing or music is playing
Set how long the system will wait before triggering a longpress action
Allow apps to bypass security systems by pretending to be a different app.

%1$s edge of the status bar pulls down quick settings
Always show quick settings on status bar pull down

Number of seconds to wait before hiding clock

Always display battery percentage when charging
Control which status bar icons are shown
Allow volume down to enter DND mode
Allow volume up to exit DND mode
Display and customize battery bar above status bar
Blend full/empty colors corresponding to battery percentage
Full → empty: red ← green ← blue ← red
Full → empty: red → green → blue → red
Show notifications ticker-style in status bar
Ticker is visible only when notification heads-up is not shown. Devices with center notch should hide cutout under User Interface settings or under Developer options.
Select the location where the Pie will be placed

Swiping up on peeking notifications will snooze heads up from that application for 1 minute

Allow override of default values with user config
Notifications will not be inverted. Use for dark themes.
Notifications will be inverted. Use for light/stock theme.
Settings based on sensors are subject to hardware compatibility. Enabling sensors for ambient display may increase power drain.

Blocking alarms have the potential to cause instability, crashes or data loss.

For better visibility on bright images

Select an image to use for static mode
Actions will be executed on screen off. On screen on the previous state will be restored.
Network mode will be switched to 2G on screen off
GPS based location service will be disabled on screen off

Number of seconds to wait before performing actions after screen on

Apply a custom icon pack for apps in the panel
Exclude apps to be shown in the panel
Tap here to add app to the blacklist
Tap on the added app to remove it

To clear all apps, pinch-in with two fingers on the panel. To block an app from being cleared, long press on its icon to star it.\n\nFor additional recents features such as multiwindow or to kill an app, long press or drag an app card in the panel.
Show recent apps panel on the left edge
Hide all force close notification dialogs

Please enter a new label. Leave blank to revert to actual.

Smart pixlar är en energisparfunktion. Beroende på hur många pixlar du väljer att stänga av, kunde du se förbättring i batteritiden.
Spara batteri genom att stänga av extra pixlar
Stänga av pixlar för att minska strömförbrukningen

Förhindrar inbränning på OLED enheter genom att skifta pixlar så ofta

This will reset battery history stats. Would you like to continue?
Display clock in quick status bar header

This mode disables the back button and you can trigger a back button action by a left swipe on navbar. Right swipe still triggers the last-app and the overview apps scrolling. To go home you can tap on any navbar empty space, not only the home button. When keyboard is showing, long press on navbar to move the text cursor.
Tap on an empty navbar space but not the home button to switch the screen off.
Display alert when network is monitored or connected via VPN

Merge signal and signal type icons
Press the Wi\u2011Fi Protected Setup button on your router. It may be called \u201cWPS\u201d or marked with this symbol:
Enter pin %1$s on your Wi\u2011Fi router. The setup can take up to two minutes to complete.
WPS succeeded. Connecting to the network\u2026
WPS is already in progress and can take up to two minutes to complete
WPS failed. Please try again in a few minutes.
The wireless router security setting (WEP) is not supported
The wireless router security setting (TKIP) is not supported
Another WPS session was detected. Please try again in a few minutes.

These are power saving features. They may interfere with services intended to run at idle, like navigation apps. You can whitelist these apps from being affected in the app battery settings.
Enter device idle more frequently and wake up less
Restrict apps from running the background
Enable Aggressive Battery automatically when using battery saver

Sets the ambient light animation duration

Nollställ batteristatistik när vald laddnivå nåtts

Smart Charging allows you to set maximum charging level to extend the lifespan of your battery. When enabled, battery stops charging at Stop trigger level and resumes charging at Start trigger level. Stop trigger level should be always greater than Start trigger level.
In order to add your own icon, select the top left icon and use the OnePlus 6T FP Customizer app to select the icon you want.

Your screen brightness will automatically adjust to your environment and activities.\n\nYou can adjust a minimal brightness level that will be used.

Once authenticated, an app stays unlocked for 15 seconds after exiting
